titleStmt.title: A proclamation set furth by the kynges maiestie, wyth the assent and consent of hys most dere vncle Edward duke of Somerset, gouernor of hys royall persone, and of hys realmes, dominions and subiectes protector, and others of his highnes priuy counsail, concernyng the inhibicion of all preachers aswell as such as hath ben licensed, as also all other, the .xxiii. day of Septembre in the second yere of his Maiesties moste gracious reigne.
Proclamations. 1548-09-23
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1547-1553 : Edward VI)

publicationStmt.publisher: In ædibus Richardi Graftoni Regij impressoris. Cum privilegio ad imprimendum solum,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Society of Antiquaries.
Appears at reels 10 and 152 (Society of Antiquaries copy).
